First Party Collection/Use: This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, share, and otherwise process the personal information of users, and other individuals in connection with our Platform.
We may collect the following information about you: Information You Provide, Automatically Collected Information, Information From Other Sources.
We use your information to improve, support and administer the Platform, to allow you to use its functionalities, and to fulfill and enforce our Terms of Service.
Third Party Sharing/Collection: We may share your information with the following parties: Business Partners, Service Providers, Advertisers, Advertising Networks and Measurement Partners.
We share your information with law enforcement agencies, public authorities or other organisations if legally required to do so...
User Access/Edit/Deletion: You can access and edit most of your profile information by signing into TikTok.
You may delete the User Content you uploaded.
If you choose to delete your entire account in Settings.
Data Retention: We retain information for as long as necessary to provide the Platform and for the other purposes set out in this Privacy Policy.
The retention periods are different depending on different criteria, such as the type of information and the purposes for which we use the information.
Data Security: We take steps to ensure that your information is treated securely and in accordance with this policy.
We have appropriate technical and organizational measures to ensure a level of security appropriate to the risk...
International/Specific Audiences: TikTok is not directed at children under the age of 13.
In certain cases this age may be higher due to local regulatory requirements.
Policy Change: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. When we update the Privacy Policy, we will notify you by updating the 'Last Updated' date at the top of this policy.
User Choice/Control: You can unsubscribe from our marketing emails at any time by clicking the 'unsubscribe' link included at the bottom of each email we send.
You may be able to refuse or disable Cookies by adjusting your device browser settings.
Introductory/Generic: Welcome to TikTok. This Privacy Policy applies to TikTok services (the 'Platform')...
Privacy contact information: If you have questions, comments, complaints or requests regarding this Privacy Policy, please contact us at: https://www.tiktok.com/legal/report/privacy.
